name: Windy Adventure
description:
Shortest story in the world about freedom and friendship :)

Edited version after 1 hours of game jam

https://www.dropbox.com/s/2knrz88gznxfs1p/Build.zip?dl=0

Input

  • WASD - rotate
  • J - up acceleration
  • K - down acceleration
  • SPACE - start engine

Theme - 

Keep It Goin' and not to stop is associated with an uncontrollable desire to fight gravity and soar at the level of clouds.

Assets

  • Amplify Color/LUT
  • Dotween Pro
  • SuperPivot (change pivot of mesh in unity)
  • Voxel Importer
  • Polygon Arsenal (gfx effects)
  • LowPolyWaterv2
  • Bolt Addons by Reality.Stop()

discord nickname: babywka
